Job Title: Product Marketing Manager

Location: Texas, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Details

Job Location

Remote - Remote, TX

Remote Type

Fully Remote

Position Type

Full Time

Job Category

Marketing

Description

DealerBuilt is an integrated portfolio of enterprise dealership solutions inclusive of DMS, CRM, desking, service lane, and marketing analytics. We pride ourselves on the fact that our cutting-edge SaaS solutions are built by dealers for dealers. We understand that every dealership is unique, and that’s why our platform is tailored to adapt to those specific needs and ambitions. Our cutting-edge technology is designed to elevate the dealership experience, offering unparalleled flexibility, efficiency, and control in managing operations. Join us in revolutionizing the automotive industry.

Why We’re Looking

We’re seeking a Product Marketing Manager to help ensure the success and alignment of our product, sales, and marketing efforts for our DealerBuilt portfolio of brands. This position will be the point person for all marketing campaigns tied to product launches, new product feature announcements, and sales enablement. This person will be fully remote.

What You’ll Do

Align with Product team to create battle cards that provide differentiation in the marketplace, provide competitive pricing analysis, and competitive product feature analysis Craft compelling product positioning that aligns with corporate branding and appeals to both customers and prospects Manage product marketing roadmap and content calendar, inclusive of launch plans for all campaigns and ownership of the go to market launch process Lead product marketing content development, while also providing strategic insights for channel marketing messaging and SEO content Lead Sales enablement deliverables Align with Sales to educate them on the product’s features and monitor the sales and revenue these product produce Align with Product, driving consistent collaboration and process improvements, as well as helping to drive market research and customer data collection (win/loss, client advisory meetings, etc.) Full understanding of our ideal customer profile by product, aligning with a go to market strategy Travel: less than 10% 

What We’re Looking For

Bachelor’s degree plus 5+ years product marketing experience, preferably within the SaaS industry Deep understanding of product lifecycles and GTM roadmaps Deep understanding of developing product marketing campaigns Experience writing marketing briefs and running marketing campaigns Self-driven, proactive, and organized Willingness to dig in, with a history of making an impact Strong written, verbal, and presentation skills Project management experience preferred Cross-functional leadership experience preferred Salesforce experience preferred Auto industry experience preferred 

What’s In It For You

Health insurance (medical, dental, vision)

Health savings account (HSA)

Flexible Spending Account (FSA)/Dependent Care FSA (DCFSA)

Accident/Hospital/Cancer Supplemental Insurance

Disability insurance

Life and AD&D Insurance

Employee Assistance Program

Unlimited paid time off

Parental leave

Referral program

DealerBuilt is an Equal Opportunity Employer of minorities, females, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.

No search firm solicitations, please.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
